question: A electrician works for 5 weeks every month and for 5 days every week. If he gets paid £80 every day, how much does he earn if he works for a year?
answer:
The electrician works for 5 days every week and works for 5 weeks every month so he works for 5 days/week * 5 weeks/month = <<5*5=25>>25 days/month
If he earns £80 every day he then earns £80/day * 25 days/month = £<<80*25=2000>>2000/month
A year is equal to 12 months so every year he earns £2000/month * 12 months/year = £<<2000*12=24,000>>24,000
#### 24,000
